We measure our community investment 
programs using the London Benchmarking Group 
methodology, which records investments of cash, 
time, in-kind and management resources. In 2014, our investments in promoting a digital society and 
other social causes totaled $10.3 million. OUR COMMUNITY INVESTMENTS
We continued to focus our community investments 
for the purpose of promoting a digital society. 51% 
of our total investments served this purpose in 
2014, while an additional 23% supported education and young people and 11% covered assistance for 
economic development programs. 
Note: Virgin Media’s community investment data is included in 2013 and 2014 only.2014
